articles.description: Ride-hailing company sells division to startup Aurora but says they will collaborate
articles.content:
Uber has ditched efforts to develop its own self-driving car with the multibillion-dollar sale of its driverless car division to a Silicon Valley startup.
The ride-hailing company is selling the bus… [+2258 chars]
